comments: I found him a terrible, arrogant teacher. He didn\'t seem to care about his students at all. I went from loving all kinds of music to dreading going to his class. He was the only bad of 30 plus teachers I\'ve had at WCC. I did the readings and he picked obscure questions for pop quizzes that even if I read twice, I wouldn\'t remember.

Yes he can be hard, but only if you don\'t ask questions in class or not do the readings, which is your responsibliity. Readings are not that bad, 10 pgs a week and a short essay on one of the readings. Exams can be difficult but if you pay attention in class and take notes all the questions are there and in the readings. Would take another with him

Ken Potts is a terrbile teacher. He\'s disrespectful, rude, and extrememly boring. Class attendance is mandatory and he fully expects everyone to read all assignments in the textbook. Lots of useless busy work, tests are somewhat difficult. Overall a terrible class.
Mr. Potts is a very arrogant person. He is rude and does not make class interesting. The class was painfully long and boring!!!
